texts.biography: At an early age, Inteus' mastery of fire earned him a spot with a troupe of entertainers.  Some believed he wad the son of a Fire Elemental.  One night, he felt a calling and left his profession.  Now he serves the Conflux.
texts.name: Inteus

specialty.description: Casts Bloodlust with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units).
specialty.name: Bloodlust
